game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Legend has it that the lost city of Eldarath holds an ancient artifact with immense power. Your quest is to retrieve this artifact and return it to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins, a magical amulet, and the gratitude of the villagers

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city from the village library
tasks.description: Speak to the village librarian to learn more about the history and location of Eldarath.

tasks.objective: Retrieve a map leading to Eldarath from the local cartographer
tasks.description: Buy or negotiate with the local cartographer for a map that will lead you to the lost city.

tasks.objective: Explore the ruins of Eldarath and retrieve the ancient artifact
tasks.description: Be cautious as you venture into the ruins, as rumors say that they are filled with traps and mysterious creatures.
